revised_title: Hedley Ralph Marston: A Pioneer in Geochemistry and Biochemistry in Australian Agriculture
tldr: This biographical memoir recounts the life of Hedley Ralph Marston, a key figure in the development of Australian agriculture. Marston's work focused on the intersection of geochemistry and biochemistry, particularly in relation to soil fertility and agricultural development. His innovative approach and dedication to improving farming practices in harsh environments made him a pioneer in his field.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Soil Science
